rules_text:
The Afterlife enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G}.
{1}{W}{B}{G}, {T}: Transform The Afterlife.
rules_text2:
When this land transforms into Yamara, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
flavor_text2: [i]Yamara's priesthood serves the gods, runs the Centennial, and calms the restless dead.[/i]
